price: pohon itu memberikan buahnya pada setiap musim dengan seizin Tuhan-nya.  Allah membuat perumpamaan-perumpamaan itu untuk manusia supaya mereka selalu ingat.
arabic: تُؤۡتِيٓ أُكُلَهَا كُلَّ حِينِۭ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهَاۗ وَيَضۡرِبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: tu'tī ukulahā kulla ḥīnin bi-idh'ni rabbihā wayaḍribu al-lahu al-amthāla lilnnāsi laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
